response:
"wasdenktich?! über 80% der deutschen sind besorgt um ihre datensicherheit, aber nur 22% tun was dagegen. wake up, leute! unsere daten sind unser eigentum. #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "what's wrong with me?! over 80% of germans are concerned about their data privacy, but only 22% do something about it. wake up, people! our data is our property. #dataprotection #privacy"
